contest-event.event-date:
July 7, 1862 D Kettering Contest
Kettering Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
kettering-contest
None
Hallelujah Chorus [unknown arranger]
Swan Street, Kettering, Northamptonshire Prizes: £12, £8, £6, £4
Organised as part of Kettering Feast. Event was marred by bad weather such that takings were less than the advertised prize money. At the end of th contest the promoter was not to be found but the bands besieged his house until he handed over what money had been taken.
Reported in Northampton Herald 12 July 1862:
Rothwell Meeting, 1st prize Rothwell, 3rd prize Thrapston, 2nd prize Kettering Temperance, 4th Prize
June 2, 2012, 8:21 p.m. Jan. 15, 2014, 3:13 p.m.
1 Rothwell Chapel Unknown
2 Thrapstone Church Unknown
3 Thrapstone Chapel Unknown
4 Kettering Temperance Unknown
